answered.question: Agent consolidation strategy for overlapping roles?
answered.answer: Keep Critic separate (challenges Architect decisions). Merge QA + QA-Code into single QA with two modes. Move secret scanning to Security only. Define strict non-overlap matrix.

answered.question: Script consolidation depth?
answered.answer: Full consolidation: shared lib/yolo-common.sh + parameterized scripts replacing 18 individual scripts with ~4 consolidated ones.

answered.question: Effort level cascading design?
answered.answer: Step-skip approach: effort controls which workflow steps execute, not agent quality. turbo skips Critic+Scout+Documenter+Security+2nd review. fast skips Documenter+2nd review.

answered.question: Mermaid diagram scope?
answered.answer: Multiple focused diagrams in docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: agent hierarchy, workflow+data flow, complexity routing, hook/script interactions.
